DOC.brief_summary: Study prospective , multicenter , randomize trial evaluate two laparoscopic incisional hernia repair method : basic laparoscopic mesh repair ( lap . ) hybrid repair ( laparoscopic mesh fascial suturation ) . Patients recruit prospectively 10 Finnish Hospitals ( Oulu , Jorvi , Hyvinkää , Kotka , Seinäjoki , Valkeakoski , Lahti , Kuopio , Kokkola , Loimaa ) . Patients randomize operative group ( lap . vs hybrid ) . Follow-up visit schedule 1- 12-month surgery . Patients evaluate clinical status ultrasound scan perform . QoL-questionnaire pain score ( VAS ) report . The primary end-points : - clinically and/or radiologically detect seroma 1 month control - clinically and/or radiologically detect recurrent hernia 1 year control The secondary end-points : - peri-and postoperative outcomes/ complication , morbidity , mortality - duration hospital stay - pain scale ( VAS ) - Quality Life ( SF/Rand36 )
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Hybrid Laparoscopic Incisional Hernia Repair
DOC.detailed_description: Hypothesis : Using hybrid method seroma formation hernia recurrence diminish . Patient exclusion criterion : Age < 18 > 80 ASA > 4 ( American Society Anaesthesiologists ' classification Physical Health ) BMI > 40 A previous mesh repair hernia Hernia defect size < 2 > 7 cm Emergency operation Eligible patient randomize two operative group ( lap/hybrid ) . In laparoscopic group hernia defect cover Parietex composite mesh ( use minimum 5 cm marginals , Securestrap fixation instrument four lifting string . In hybrid group hernia sack resect fascial defect suture minilaparotomy incision . After , mesh repair perform laparoscopically .
